analysis.description:
Nexgen.payout (/unique_chucks/24/0xe1e7e4002bc27f50491bee42760b80a44fa7e381.sol#501-509) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- _address.transfer(address(this).balance) (/unique_chucks/24/0xe1e7e4002bc27f50491bee42760b80a44fa7e381.sol#505-508)
